entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
